mockData.setupScript: window.localStorage.setItem('use_mock_data', 'true'); window.localStorage.setItem('MOCK_DATA_ENABLED', 'true'); window.localStorage.setItem('mock_enabled', 'true'); console.log('Mock data flags set in localStorage');

screenshots.beforeScreenshot: const filterBtn = document.querySelector('button[data-filter-button="true"]'); if (filterBtn) { filterBtn.click(); } else { const allButtons = Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('button')); const filterButton = allButtons.find(btn => btn.textContent && btn.textContent.includes('Filter')); if (filterButton) filterButton.click(); }
